participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: outgoing, laid-back, enjoys socializing with friends
participant_1.background: i like to grill outdoors. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i've been retired for a years.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: introverted, imaginative, slightly anxious in social situations
participant_2.background: i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home.

content.text: Why don't you apply for a remote job?
I do not work, I do not work at all.
Why do you dream about it then?
